name: Dollhouse Escape!
description:
This game has been made in 2 days for the VR Jan Jam. It was built using WebXR, however, due to the many build issues and the tight deadline I had to export to PCVR.

Give logical instructions and solve puzzles in this tiny escape room where you control a doll using only directions to get to the exit door.

I hope you enjoy and make sure to leave feedback ;)

CONTROLS

XRRig Up/Down: Right Joystick

XRRig Forward/Backward/Sideways: Left Joystick

Grab Key: Grip/Trigger

Doll Instructions: Click on your Left Hand CMD button and click on the sequence of instructions the doll must follow, then click on the "Go!" button to have it start moving.

Open Padlock: Make the doll grab the key, then use it from your inventory to unlock the padlock with your own hands.

Changelog:

v1.2
